title: 820-2879 No power on one USB port [solved]
message: I have a 820-2879 with no power to one USB port. No water damage, I measured PP5V_S3_RTUSB_B_ILIM at pin 6 of Q4690 and I get .070 and pin 7 measures 5.0V. I replaced Q4690 and same thing. I also have 3.3 at both enable pins on Q4690.  Any ideas???

title: 820-2879 No power on one USB port [solved]
message:
with your DMM in diode mode red probe to ground measure pin 1 from J4610, report value.....
Is something getting hot?????
If every thing is ok, then you have a bad Q4690 or wrong soldered

title: 820-2879 No power on one USB port [solved]
message: Pin 1 is measuring 0.00V and pin 4 is measuring 0.00V

title: 820-2879 No power on one USB port [solved]
message: Pin 4 is ok cause it is ground, but pin 1 is shorted, you can remove L4615 and see in which pin is the short, if is on pin1 problem could be C4615, C4616, C4617 or Q4690 again, if the short is on pin 2 the problem is D4610.

title: 820-2879 No power on one USB port [solved]
message: Quick question; I am getting the same measurements for the other USB on pins one and four and that one is working??

title: 820-2879 No power on one USB port [solved]
message: did you test it in diode mode with red probe to ground and black on each pin????? do you have a beep on DMM testing on pin 4????

title: 820-2879 No power on one USB port [solved]
message: Pin 1 give me a beep on J4610, and pin 1 on 4600 DOES give me a reading now. (my fault!!)

title: 820-2879 No power on one USB port [solved]
message: C4617 was shorted to ground, replaced it, and now USB is working!!! Thanks again aprendiz for your help and prompt response!! Much appreciated!!

title: 820-2879 No power on one USB port [solved]
message:
Gives you a reading of what?

What reading do you get and what mode is the meter on for this? On diode mode, red probe on ground, black probe on

1) pin 1 of L4615
2) pin 2 of L4615
3) pin 1 of L4605
4) pin 2 of L4605

I just want to make sure no confusing nonsense is being missed in the measuring process here.
